official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey, without consideration, to the State of Nebraska certain land to be used for the purposes of expanding the Chadron State Park, Nebraska.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey to the State of Nebraska, specified Nebraska National Forest lands in Dawes County, Nebraska, to be used as part of the Chadron State Park.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey, without consideration, to the State of Nebraska certain land to be used for the purposes of expanding the Chadron State Park, Nebraska.
